Html:
Hi!

It seems that the chart series StackedColumnSeries in not present in the latest wpf toolkit release. Where can I find it? Is there any workaround to create a stacked column chart from the avaible chart series?

I tried to download several older versions of wpf toolkit, but for all of them, the chart controls did not even appear in the toolbox, despite that I added the assembly to the references?

What have I missed?
